question.xref: DES s6, HC p106, KYTS p16
question.text: What MUST you do when you see this sign?

explanation.text: STOP signs are situated at junctions where visibility is restricted or there is heavy traffic. They MUST be obeyed. You MUST stop. Take good all-round observation before moving off.

answer.text: Stop, only if traffic is approaching
Stop, even if the road is clear
Stop, only if children are waiting to cross
Stop, only if a red light is showing
